rules.name: 1. Mock ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech
rules.description: Returns mock audio for TTS requests - saves API credits during development

rules.name: 2. Mock ElevenLabs Sound Effects
rules.description: Returns mock SFX audio for sound generation requests

rules.name: 3. Mock ElevenLabs Voices List
rules.description: Returns mock voices list without API call

rules.name: 5. Mock ElevenLabs User/Subscription
rules.description: Returns mock user data with unlimited credits

response.value:
{
  "subscription": {
    "tier": "pro_unlimited_mock",

rules.name: 6. Simulate Generation Delay
rules.description: Adds realistic delay to mock audio generation
